name: Crazy Ice-Cream Shop
description:
Try to serve all clients using a ice-cream machine that is out of control!

How to Play:

  • Click on the machine levers to catch a ice-cream
  • Click on a client to deliver the ice-cream
  • Click in the trashcan to discard a ice-cream

Game made to GMTK game jam, with the theme "Out of Control".

Music made by LeonimuZ.
